vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀνεκ-διήγητος, ον,
indescribable, ineffable, [NT+5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: indescribable, with the associative meanings of marvelous and wonderful
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
indescribable, with the associative meanings of marvelous and wonderful
which cannot be related, inexpressible, unutterable, 2Cor. 9:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 無法形容的, 不可名狀的 (林後 9:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 无法形容的, 不可名状的 (林后 9:15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không thể tả; không tả xiết
